verses.roman:
"ātmārāmāś ca api" kare kṛṣṇe ahaitukī bhakti
"munayaḥ santaḥ" iti kṛṣṇa-manane āsakti

synonyms: ātmārāmāḥ ca api—self-realized persons also; kare—do; kṛṣṇe—unto Kṛṣṇa; ahaitukī bhakti—unmotivated devotional service; munayaḥ santaḥ—great saintly persons and transcendentalists; iti—thus; kṛṣṇa-manane—in meditation on Kṛṣṇa; āsakti—attraction.
translation: "The six kinds of ātmārāmas render devotional service to Kṛṣṇa without ulterior motives. The words munayaḥ and santaḥ indicate those who are very attached to meditating upon Kṛṣṇa.
